caption.title: Accelerated phase 1 CMC mAb timeline for a pandemic.
caption.p: The timeline to phase 1 clinical studies using mAb therapeutics for pandemic outbreaks can be substantially accelerated without heightened product safety risks as compared with current practice. Tox, toxicology; MCB, master cell bank; DS, drug substance; DP, drug product; PD, process development; form, formulation; AD, analytical development.
